text: shri lankiya jana hadawathwalata kramayen samipawemin usas sewawak saha nobindena wishwasayak godanagagath el.bi. finans samagama idiriyedith paribhogika obata wadath samipa usas sewawak sapayima sandaha balaporoththu weyi.
ekdina loka shurayin lesa ema abhimanaya raka ganime amathara wagakimath owun pita patawi thibima shri lanka kandayamata thawath amathara wasiyak genadenu athi.
maha polowa wata pamana mana balanu!

nethata kandulak sema sithata suwayak dewana yamak obe jiwitha mathaka pothe athi bawa danimi.idin kawiyo da me samarum – mathaka - sihiwatana prasthutha karagena nanaprakara nirmana pelagaswannaha.sihiwatanaya se kumak liyannada obe suwanda randi samaru pothe sithuwili dahasak sithaka upannada kumak liyannada samaru pothededunu patathi pituwen pituwata aasiri rekha suhada pathum obe nuwan mata ki de rahasin liya thiyannada miyuru sarinaatha dihawaka aadara werale apa hamuwuyemu arunode ewan ape pem kathandare mama liya thiyannada samaru pothe  pada : dharma shri wikramasinhasangithaya : aacharya wiktar rathnayakagayanaya : abewardhana balasuriyaobe samaru potha digukaragena oba balahindiyi.
ee sara liyo asuwoth oya waga

pinthura sewime wisharada 2) mage pariganakaye, ek thatiyak matha pinthura ekama foldarayaka gabada kara atha (ebawin, galari dekak nirmanaya kirime lakshyayak nomatha) - eya tharkika therimak wanu atha "pinthura samuhayak (galari)"(boho parishilakayinta samana thathwayak athi bawa mama sithanawa, ebawin obata palamu chedaya matha obage therima wahama nathara kala hakiya, rupa satahana 3 balanna).
